author: Jonathan Rivera
comment: Tried connecting this app to two different moto 360s and the say thing happens, it crashes and does not connect. Tried emailing the developers and nothing. Was really hoping to get this work. Guess not
title: Doesn't Work

author: Mustafa Hashmi
comment: On Moto360 app stops running. Have to re-enable it atleast twice in the day.  Would like a custom schedule option for battery savings were I can define On and Off time. Thanks keep it up.
title: Good effort. Needs tweaking.

author: William Ames
comment: App setting allow you to disable the b/t icon, yet it stuff shows on all your windows.  Uninstalled. Developer clueless.
title: Annoying B/T icon

author: Jay S Brindle
comment: It needs to stop auto enabling the widget when I reset and it needs custom options to be able to turn Bluetooth on and off at as many different times as you want at custom set times during in the day too so you could have it disabled if busy at multiple times in the day and if you don't want to be distracted by it and when your asleep etc.

reply.author: DroidHackers, LLC
reply.content: Could you send us an email (droidhackersllc@gmail.com) containing any details you have on the widget resetting issue? Also, thanks for the suggestion and we'll work on adding the scheduler. ^AV

title: Could be great but

author: Jan Newbould
comment: Seems to be working on my LG Watch R although the watch image doesn't show a picture of my watch just a question mark?  Also the widget and icons could do with bringing up to date with the Android 5 style as they'd fit better on the watch face!
title: Great Idea

author: Gil Hamlin
comment: I'm really excited about this app! Even though it's not quite working with the moto 360 at this time, I've purchased to support the future development. Please keep at it - if I can only squeeze an extra hour a day out of my watch, it'll be money well spent!

reply.author: DroidHackers, LLC
reply.content: Thanks for your support!  We are about to release an update with new features and with bug-fixes specific to the Moto as well as all wear devices. ^KT

title: Oozes potential

author: Loveisthemovement 88
comment: Horrible I've tried on multiple settings and tried multiple configurations. This eats my battery up way more than not having it -  moto360

reply.author: DroidHackers, LLC
reply.content: When did it start eating your battery? What other applications do you have installed ?  Please send us an email so we can send you a diagnostic build that can collect the information to understand your problem.  You are the first one to report a battery consumption problem and we are committed to helping you resolve it. ^KT

title: Updated

author: Movie Guru
comment: While I am at work my phone is on my desk so I use the app to force bluetooth off and then turn it on again when I leave the office.. my Moto360 got placed on the charger at 10:30pm with 56% left! Started the day at 7am with the Moto

reply.author: DroidHackers, LLC
reply.content: Thanks for the nice review!  We are just about to release the next major update that allows scheduling of times to turn the Bluetooth on and off and the option to automatically reset the statistics every time the device gets fully charged.  Please let us know if you have any suggestions for new features in the application. ^KT

title: Works as advertised and worth the money..

author: Elizabeth Rosenberry
comment: I couldn't get the Bluetooth to turn on when I wanted. Tried to uninstall but it won't get off my Watch! Now it won't connect.

reply.author: DroidHackers, LLC
reply.content: This has been mostly fixed in the v2 release. Please see the FAQ in the description for info on how to do a proper uninstall and why the bluetooth sometimes doesn't connect right away. ^AV

title: Didn't seem to work

author: Carl Merritt
comment: Just tried it out today on my Moto 360 + T-Mobile HTC One M7.  While the battery life for my Moto 360 was fantastic, and it did do it's wake-up every 10 minutes to pick up notifications, it would never connect bluetooth on demand.  This means all ability to talk to your smart watch and issue voice commands is broken, even when I tried to disable the power save functions of this app entirely.  Maybe this is a bug introduced since the Moto 360 got a FW update last week?  Please fix ASAP, great concept here, thanks.

reply.author: DroidHackers, LLC
reply.content:
We're currently looking into this bug and it seems to be caused by the 4.4.1 update.
We'll be releasing an update shortly. ^KT

EDIT: This bug is caused by the Android Wear connection cycle. It's been mostly fixed in the v2 update. Star the bug at https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=80744 if you'd like to see it fixed for real. ^AV

title: Great app concept, but currently a fatal bug.

author: mike Jones who?
comment: Just what I needed. My 360 is perfect now!
title: Awesome!!!

author: Ken T
comment: I was hesitant to purchase the app at $2.99, but considering what I spent on the watch it was worth every penny to get the battery life we all need.  Great job developer!  Can't wait for the update with time scheduling for on and off!  Then I can have the blue tooth off while I sleep and have it turn just before I get up in the morning.  All my messages will be waiting for me to read.  Thanks again developer, this is the best app I have for my Samsung Live.
title: This app made my Samsung Watch Battery last more than 24 hours!

author: Mike Fraser
comment: I own the Moto360 and I am plagued with the same problems that others are mentioning. The developer has been aware of the issues for months and yet the last update was over two months ago. In one of their comments from the end of October they went out and said that they are just about to release an update. That sounded promising... Until I looked at my calendar and I realized that we are almost a month from when they posted that.

reply.author: DroidHackers, LLC
reply.content: We're two people developing two applications. I get your frustration, and we've just switched apps. A new version with tons of enhancements will be coming in the next few days. ^AV

title: Developer is writing checks with their mouth that their app can't cash

author: Michael Lynady
comment: With the amount of unsatisfied customers and the only feedback is blaming end-users-Google would be doing a great service by never allowing these charlatans to offer an app ever again

reply.author: DroidHackers, LLC
reply.content: I get the reasoning for this review; we're about to push a new version. It's taken a lot longer than expected due to some issues we've been having on the Moto. ^AV

title: Majority can't be wrong

author: Joey Ofori
comment: I see the potential of this app but now it keeps disconnecting my phone, even when I turn the app off! Really annoying this somehow messed up my phone...please fix this

reply.author: DroidHackers, LLC
reply.content: We'll help you solve this.  How were you turning the app off?  And what settings did you have configured?  Please send us an email with details since 350 chars is too short to address the issue. ^KT

title: Keeps disconnecting my watch even when off!

author: Sir Codes
comment: New update is even better than before, and the mobile app is awesome!
title: Great app. Does what it says

author: Lawrence Wayne Austin
comment: Had problems with the LG g watch as didn't get any notifications, tried different types of settings but no change, it did extend battery life performance but blue tooth syncing was a problem, you should do a proper tutorial maybe a video showcasing the app itself as this would help  clear up any misunderstandings, and needs updating the map I'm from UK not America...
title: Battery saver v2

author: Brian Bauer
comment: It shortens my battery life.
title: Worse

author: Nuruddeen Lewis
comment: Great concept that is greatly needed. However, when you try to reduce the aggressiveness of battery monitoring it doesn't do it. I had to uninstall it. I'm eagerly awaiting an update.

reply.author: DroidHackers, LLC
reply.content: We haven't seen this issue before.  Please email us your device info (wear and mobile device types, Android versions) and any other relevant info you may have.  We will get this resolved for you as quickly as possible. ^KT

title: Settings don't stick!

author: Una Thompson
comment: Love the mobile app and the stats
title: New update is awesome
